abstract: Rumors of a BHP Billiton–Rio Tinto mining megamerger were percolating for months before BHP said Thursday it had made a formal approach. But after looking at the recent trading in Rio Tinto’s stock options, one analyst speculated that someone may have had advance notice that an offer was coming.
